data.prayer: Father, help the 97,975 believers in Lu'an to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,193,525 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lu‘an, Anhui, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Lu'an.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 164 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lu‘an, Anhui, China.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Please, convict the 97,975 believers in Lu‘an, Anhui, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, help the 97,975 believers in Lu'an to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Lu'an access to a Bible in their own language.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,291,500 people living in the county of Lu'an.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lu‘an, Anhui, China has a population of 1,291,500.

We estimate Lu'an has 97,975 people who might know Jesus, 20,864 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,172,661 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Lu'an.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
